_header: Look how Flanders doth fare with his follyhead
Subjects: political poems; John, duke of Burgundy
_description: The follies of the duke of Burgundy — nine 14-line stanzas (ababababccdddc)

BodDig102.First Lines:
Loke how fflaundres doþ fare wiþ his folyhedeDurste no
                    man dygge after troute wiþ no manere toles…
